abstract: CBS announced Friday that a correspondent, Steve Hartman, would travel the country and file "On the Road" dispatches modeled after those reported by the late Charles Kuralt.
snippet: CBS announced Friday that a correspondent, Steve Hartman, would travel the country and file "On the Road" dispatches modeled after those reported by the late Charles Kuralt.
lead_paragraph: "On the Road," the famous CBS News franchise, is back on.

headline.main: CBS News Heads Back 'On the Road'
